title: Banana and peanut butter cake
ingredients: ['175g melted unsalted butter', '1 large banana, pureed', '1 1/2 tablespoons smooth peanut butter', '3 medium eggs', '150g brown sugar', '200g plain flour', '1/2 tablespoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon milk', 'Icing', '150g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon milk']
